sn12.16:4.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.16:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.16:4.6: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hotī”ti?
sn12.16:5.1: * “Jarāmaraṇassa ce bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.16:5.2: Jarāmaraṇassa ce bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti, ‘dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.16:5.3: Jarāmaraṇassa ce bhikkhu nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādāvimutto hoti, ‘diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.16:6.11: avijjāya ce bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.16:6.12: Avijjāya ce bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti, ‘dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāya.
sn12.16:6.13: Avijjāya ce bhikkhu nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādāvimutto hoti, ‘diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto bhikkhū’ti alaṃvacanāyā”ti.
